Actions.Text: COMMITTEE DISCHARGED AND COMMITTED TO RULES

Title: Relates to tuition reimbursement interim rates
Summary: Requires certain tuition reimbursement interim rates to include the annual growth amount for such rates approved for the two thousand twenty-two--two thousand twenty-three school year and annually thereafter pending certification of the prospective rates for such school year and subsequent years.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to tuition reimbursement interim rates
